BioShock Infinite, more like BioShock finite!!! only one ending to the story soo nothing you do matters. why not just take the bender path and KILL ALL HUMANS!!!
I'm glad I played this bioshock last, cause i never would have touched the masterpieces that are bioshock 1 and 2.
Hard isnt hard, at ALL!!!
Bioshock 1 and 2 had enemies that one was actually afraid of. Huge lumbering giants that left you alone if you left them alone. Things you avoid until you have the ammo and health to hunt. that sound you could hear from rooms away, will it be behind this corner?. Fights that would end with the player having no health packs like 7 health and only 3 guns that still had ammo. This game still has guns and abilities but they are all sad and I just find myself running out of ammo and salts.
Ooh no you died here have some ammo and free health and spawn right next 2 where you were? I did like how it sounded like Elizabeth said FUCKER FUCKER!!! Every time she revived you
No saves, auto saving bullshit. And I always miss the tiny logo sooo i have no idea when saves drop. Just quit and pick back up where I left off. FUCKCKCKCKCK I LOST AN HOUR OF GAME PLAY!!!
I love getting attacked by people who were friendly for no reason with no warning 
Why is the protagonist soo damn demanding to Elizabeth, would it be soo hard for him to be a gentleman? throw in a would you kindly toss me a health pack Elizabeth.
would you kindly toss me a gun
toss me some salts, would you kindly.
It's not hard
The lock picking system is dumb as hell and the rest of the story is often behind a locked door. Do i open this safe with money? And have no way to continue the game unless i load my last save or do i continue with the story never knowing whats in the box.
Ooo you paid extra for dlc, heres 5 free keys!!! Ooh look a safe that costs and get this, 5 keys!!!
Got caught in a loop of dying before my character could get back up, 7 deaths in before I gave up and loaded last checkpoint
Navigation arrow got stuck leading me in a loop, had to google my way out only to find it was taking me WAY OFF COURSE.
Can only hold 2 guns at a time
Can't hold potions for salt or health
What a dumb ass story! It could have been something good, but they just tossed all the plot out the window.

快打到最后的时候心里就隐隐有些不安，当我杀了我以为的大BOSS后这种感觉更强烈了，从和安娜的对话中我就觉得结局不会是这么简单的，但是没想到会是这么的复杂，这么的无力，现在是晚上12点，可能这种感觉会更加的强烈吧，每次遇到这么精品的游戏都有种想找人聊聊的冲动，可是却找不到人可以诉说，这可能就是孤独单机玩家的悲哀吧。建议用心玩，主线我选的中等难度也才14小时的流程，而且我并不擅长玩这种FPS游戏。最后：我永远爱着伊丽莎白！
我要娶伊丽莎白呜呜呜
Потрясающая игра !

I think as far as PC Bioshock Infinite is definitely the best one of the series to run on your computer. By no means am I saying you shouldn't play all of them but the original 2 games were such poorly ported that they hardly have any value in this day and age. Bioshock infinite and all the Bioshock games are truly a masterpiece. Containing some of the best storytelling and writing I've ever seen in a game. If you haven't played them, then you owe it to yourself.
ta weno
Amazing everything

Eh it's alright, it has the last of us hype all over it with

-Cool emotional story
but
-Gameplay is just like every other shooter games, the only unique thing you get here is the magic and skills and the fun rail sliding thing. But other than that, you're fighting shooting enemies in a shooting game with like 1 boss fight that turns into generic enemies type bosses. 

Dont buy the game if you are expecting amazing unique gameplay things like you think its a fallout game explore open world with elizabeth as your companion, think of it more like last of us straight path with the same enemies, but rather buy it for the mindfuck storyline and Elizabeth's journey.

Que desfecho incrível para a saga Bioshock! O Infinite traz consigo uma jogabilidade ótima, belos gráficos, e principalmente um enredo impressionante. Valeu cada centavo tanto este quanto os outros jogos da saga. Nada é o que parece, tudo é constante, tudo varia! 

Nota: 10/10
Story got me hooked and the sceenery was amazing.

Шикарная игра, с очень запутанным сюжетом, который обыгрывает параллельные миры.
Букер Девитт получает задание, он должен найти девушку и привести, так его долг будет уплачен. Готов ли он взяться за это дело?
Прибыв на маяк, он активирует механизм и к его удивлению он запускает Букера в небо, перед его взором является небесный город, Колумбия, где ему и предстоит пройти через сложности, повстречать новых персонажей, с боем пройти испытания и выполнить порученную ему миссию.
Герою предстоит пройти через боль утраты, сложные решения, воспоминания о своих ужасных и кровавых поступках, повстречать удивительных людей и познать себя с другой стороны
Эту игру невозможно забыть...
Elizabeth iki gözümün çiçeği

I just finished my 2nd play through after 3 or so years. This game is truly a work of art. In my opinion, it’s my favorite Bioshock game. The set pieces are great, Booker Dewitt has a hard ass attitude and he doesn’t take crap from anyone. He’s a boss, for real
After finishing the gameI just imagined how good of a movie this would make, or a miniseries. 
One negative thing if I had to nitpick is the ending. I really like the ending, but it’s convoluted and hard to follow. 

Overall great game. Enjoyed it more now than back then I’d say.

DLC 바다의 무덤 1, 2부까지 플레이를 끝냈습니다.
1편에서 부터 3편까지 이야기가 매끄럽게 연결되고 자연스럽게 마무리지어지는게 무슨 잘 짜여진 장편 소설을 보는듯 했습니다. 
 바이오쇼크 1, 2편은 도시의 체제의 모순을 중심으로 이야기가 흘러가기에 자연스럽게 이어졌다 생각하고 이런 무거운 소재와 신박한 배경 그리고 여러 인물들의 이야기가 바이오쇼크의 묘미라고 볼 수 있겠는데 바이오쇼크 인피니트에서는 시간이동이라는 요소를 넣고 이전작과의 연관점을 넣으려 하다 보니 이야기가 진행될수록 힘이 빠지는 것 같은 느낌이 들었습니다. 또, 이 세부설정 면에서도 이전작보다 부실한것 같았습니다. (전작과 달리 양자역학이나 균열로 때운다는 느낌을 지울수가 없었음.) 
 DLC는 상당히 만족할 수준이였습니다. 엔딩에서 1편의 주인공이 어떻게 랩쳐에 돌아올 수 있게 되었고 엘리자베스가 죽을것을 알면서도 왜 랩처로 돌아오게 된 것인가를 알 수 있게 되는데 이전 작품의 결말을 본 저로선 대단히 감동적이였습니다.
 이전 작품을 흥미롭게 플레이 했고 깊게 파고들었었다면 이 게임을 산것에 대해 절대로 후회하지 않을 것입니다.
La segunda vez que lo gano, ahora con los DLC y que decir. Majestuoso. Recomiendo jugarlo al 100% y si pueden, jueguen antes al 1. No se van a arrepentir!

Дополнительный контент порадовал даже еще больше, пролили свет на связь с первой частью игры. Также было приятно вернуться в "Восторг" и исследовать его ( все же по душе больше мрачные локации), порадовало и изменения геймплея, где в основе был стелс. Потрясающий шутер с глубоким сюжетом, развернувшемся в воздушном городе, который очень красиво выглядит и легко запоминается с отличной музыкой.

La trama es impresionante y muy buena, el desarrollo de los personajes al punto de que sientas cariño y empatía, especialmente por Elizabeth, siento el juego como una crítica social y lo digo porque en la ciudad de columbia es una fanática religiosa y racista. Incluso los personajes que hay en columbia no se sienten vacíos y le dan más vida al juego, desde los que son más protagónicos hasta los que solo interactúas una vez. Como siempre el estilo y diseño de la ciudad llama mucho la atención más aparte que la trama se ve enriquecida con teorías científicas y física cuántica. 


Gráficamente es bastante bonito, la variedad y cada detalle de los escenarios, los gestos de Elizabeth en específico están muy bien hecho. La jugabilidad es algo sorprendente ya que Elizabeth funciona como alguien que te ayuda y no tienes que estar preocupándote por protegerla, las batallas son frenéticas y por eso cuidar a alguien más seria molesto; hay una buena cantidad de armas y poderes que obtienes además de que implementaron los carriles que hace el combate más especial y el que le puedas pedir a Elizabeth maquinas, armas, torretas o botequines de otras dimensiones y todo esto lo hace un shooter único y divertido, cada enfrentamiento está justificado y ligado al argumento. 

  
El final es uno de los mejores que eh visto en un videojuego, todos los datos y piezas al final se unen y que todo tiene un sentido lógico que te va hacer sentir barias emociones y te dejara pensando por un tiempo en especial la escena post créditos si no prestaste atención, en total si te la pasas explorando son más de 16 horas de juego, ese es otro punto bueno ya que talvez sea un juego lineal pero te da la oportunidad de explorar y como recompensa te dará distintos objetos y algunas piezas extra de la historia. Aun si te parece poco tiempo los DLC´s son igual que buenos por si no te es suficiente, cuenta más trama a la historia principal, pero de otra perspectiva. 


Talvez no sea un juego para todos, más que un shooter es un juego para empaparte de una historia un poco compleja en la que tienes que prestar atención a cada detalle, la acción es algo secundario y aunque no seas fan de bioshock definitivamente debes jugar este ya que para mí es una obra maestra y una experiencia única que no te debes perder.
